thread.title: City snapshot: Reckitt Benckiser raises full-year revenue targets

title: City snapshot: Reckitt Benckiser raises full-year revenue targets
text:
21 Oct 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Reckitt Benckiser has defied the City yet again by continuing to beat analyst expectations with a 7% jump in like-for-like sales to Â£2.2bn in the third quarter. Available to members only
